RelatedSentence: ISLAMABAD : The circular debt , which has again risen to a hefty Rs 300 billion , might trigger power outages of 12 to 14 hours a day in the near future , as the independent power producers ( IPPs ) have expressed their inability to generate power at full capacity this summer .

ISLAMABAD : The circular debt , which has again risen to a hefty Rs 300 billion , might trigger power outages of 12 to 14 hours a day in the near future , as the independent power producers ( IPPs ) have expressed their inability to generate power at full capacity this summer .

In view of this serious liquidity crunch , IPPs would not be able to generate power at full capacity and due to huge increase in the summer demand , the shortfall will substantially increase and as a result the load - shedding could hit 12-14 hours a day , IPPs letter said .
